description:
The sequel to Inferno+, Radiangames' critically-acclaimed twin-stick action-RPG, Inferno 2 boasts even more devious levels, more weapons, more upgrades and powers, more enemies, and more customization, along with more insane explosions and particle effects. 

Blast through 80+ levels full of enemies and secrets while upgrading your ship the way you want.

* Play through 80+ levels of atmospheric awesomeness

* Customize your arsenal of upgradable weapons and ship powers

* Single player and 2 player local co-op for the first time!

* New Game+ mode adds even more replayability

* 3 difficulty levels (change it up at any time)

* All-new special level types and goals. Survival and boss fights!

* Dozens of enemy types

* Tons of secrets to discover
name: Inferno 2
